title: Clients page: fix sidebar overlap, add Add Client CTA, and seed mock rows

requirements.summary: Apply a shared layout-level left inset so main content is not overlapped by the ~220px left sidebar.
acceptanceCriteria: When viewing /clients, the page title and the search input are fully visible and not hidden behind the sidebar.
The main content area has a consistent left inset that accounts for an approximately 220px-wide sidebar on desktop-sized viewports.
The fix is applied in a shared layout/container (not only by hardcoding spacing in one specific page) so other pages do not regress.

file_operations.description: Update the shared application layout so the content container (SidebarInset and/or its main/footer regions) applies a consistent desktop left inset (e.g., margin-left) that accounts for the ~220px sidebar width, preventing any page content (including /clients title/search) from rendering beneath the sidebar.

requirements.summary: Add an "Add Client" CTA button in the Clients page header that navigates to /add-client.
acceptanceCriteria: The Clients page header shows the "Clients" title with an "Add Client" button on the same row, aligned to the right.
Clicking the "Add Client" button navigates to "/add-client" and renders the Add New Client form.
All user-facing text is in English and the button label is exactly "Add Client".

file_operations.description: Add a prominent shadcn/ui Button labeled "Add Client" in the header row, aligned to the top-right next to the "Clients" title, and wire it to navigate({ to: '/add-client' }). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Render 5 Swiss-oriented mock client rows when the backend client list is empty (and not loading).
acceptanceCriteria: If the backend client list is empty (and not loading), the Clients table renders exactly 5 mock rows using the specified names.
Each mock row displays non-empty values for Status, Risk Level, Nationality, Relationship Manager, and Onboarding Date columns.
If the backend returns one or more clients, the real backend data is shown (mock rows are not shown).

file_operations.description: Add a dedicated mock data module exporting exactly 5 realistic Swiss-oriented client rows using the required names (Hans Mueller, Sophie Dubois, Marco Rossi, Elena Fischer, Philippe Bonvin) with non-empty Status, Risk Level, Nationality, Relationship Manager display, and Onboarding Date values suitable for the Clients table.

When the backend client list has loaded and is empty, display the 5 mock rows from the new mock module instead of the empty-state row; when real clients exist, keep showing backend data only. Ensure mock rows provide values for Status, Risk Level, Nationality, Relationship Manager, and Onboarding Date and do not appear during loading.
